ai-tika-abh09t3:1_0: (The text should be expanded as in the six rules.
ai-tika-abh09t3:1_1: Don’t block the streams that are in motion.
ai-tika-abh09t3:1_2: So what is known as the aggregates, and what is known as the sense fields.
ai-tika-abh09t3:2_0: The section for recitation on what is finished.
